title.rendered: Stripe at Slush: Pay-ving the Way

column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” column_padding_type=”advanced” gradient_type=”default”][vc_column_text]Stripe is an iconic startup that builds world-class financial infrastructure for companies of all sizes. When you bought your ticket to Slush this year in our shop, that was Stripe! We’ve been using Stripe’s solution for years, and we’re now joining forces to take that partnership further.[/vc_column_text][nectar_single_testimonial testimonial_style=”small_modern” color=”Default” quote=”We could not be more excited to help the next generation of unicorn founders grow with Stripe. In its own way, Stripe is a testament to our theme for 2023: building lasting products, lazer-focused on sustained growth.” name=”Eerika Savolainen” subtitle=”CEO at Slush”][vc_column_text]Stripe wants to connect and continue to learn more from startups in our ecosystem. They build financial infrastructure that makes it easier to start and scale for the next generation of founders.[/vc_column_text][nectar_single_testimonial testimonial_style=”small_modern” color=”Default” quote=”Stripe was built for startups—whether you’re just starting out or looking to evolve your product, we’re excited to meet and learn from founders driving innovation in Europe.” name=”Fanny Talagrand” subtitle=”Head of Startups and SMB, EMEA at Stripe”][vc_column_text]You can join Stripe team members throughout the event. Stripe will host a lounge at the legendary Founders Day on Day 0 (Nov 29). At the Main Event, they’ll have a booth near the Founder Stage, where you can stop by for one-on-one in-depth conversations. Stripe will also host several events for founders and operators, including an AMA session and lunch with former Stripe COO and current advisor, Claire Hughes Johnson.

Learn more about Stripe at Slush, sign up for Stripe events, and get in touch with the Stripe team here.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
